page.title: 05SOCIAL CONCERNS
page.content: WHEN WE ASKED PEOPLE WHAT WAS THE THING THAT THEY WERE CONCERNED ABOUT IN OUR BLOCK NEARLY EVERYONE SAID THAT THEY WERE CONCERNED ABOUT THE AMOUNT OF HOUSE BUILDING THAT MIGHT HAPPEN.THEY WERE CONCERNED IN CASE A BIG BUILDER LIKE BARRETT GOT PERMISSION TO BUILD LOTS AND LOTS OF HOUSES BECAUSE THERE ARE LOTS OF NEW HOUSES BEING BUILT IN VILLAGES NEARBY AND PEOPLE WERE CONCERNED IN CASE THEY WERE BUILT IN OUR AREA. PEOPLE THOUGHT THAT WOULD SPOIL THE AREA. OTHER PEOPLE WERE CONCERNED BECAUSE THEY FELT THAT AS A PETROL COMPANY WAS DRILLING FOR OIL IN OUR AREA,THERE WOULD BE HORRIBLE DERRICKS AND OTHER OIL DRILLING OBJECTS ERECTED AND A LOT OF HEAVY LORRIES AND PIPES,IF OIL WAS FOUND.
